Hi I'm fairly new to NEAT. I'm thinking of writing my own NEAT
implementati=
on from scratch, rather than modify one of the existing
releases. The main =
reasons are fisrtly, to improve my understanding
and secondly to give me th=
e flexibility to add any extra bits I feel
might be interesting.
Based on s=
ome suggestions posted here, I hope to include some form of
time delay as w=
ell as the ability to use a range of different transfer
functions.

It's pr=
obably going to be written in C++ under MS windows. My interest
at the mome=
nt is oriented to applying NEAT to analysis of noisy time
series data.

Wou=
ld appreciate any suggestions, pitfalls, feature-wishes, lessons
learnt etc=
, that may be useful for me to know in advance in this. 

Mike
